name: Boucle Pouffe with Burl Plinth - White
description: The Bouclé Pouffe features a burl-veneered plinth and is upholstered in an off-white bouclé fabric. With its compact shape, the pouffe makes ideal extra seating for unexpected guests, a soft footrest or a side table for drinks trays. Made in the UK. The Bouclé Pouffe with Burl Plinth is the ideal accessory for those looking to add a touch of Burl into their design.
